auth.codeExpired: This code has expired. Please request a new one.
auth.invalidCode: That code isn't correct. Please try again.
auth.createAccount: Create an account to get started
auth.codeSentTo: We sent an email verification code to
auth.termsText: By continuing, you agree to Rallia's Terms of Use.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.emptyDescription: You'll see game invitations, reminders, and updates here
notifications.signInPrompt: Please sign in to view your notifications
notifications.onboardingPrompt: Finish setting up your profile to receive and view notifications

preferences.title: Notification Preferences
preferences.description: Choose how you want to be notified about different events. Turn each option on or off.

match_invitation.title: Game On!
match_invitation.body: {playerName} wants to play {sportName} with you on {matchDate}{startTime}

match_join_request.title: New Player Request
match_join_request.body: {playerName} wants to join your {sportName} game on {matchDate}

match_join_accepted.title: You're In!
match_join_accepted.body: Your {sportName} game on {matchDate} at {locationName} is confirmed. See you there!

match_join_rejected.title: Request Declined
match_join_rejected.body: Your request to join the {sportName} game wasn't accepted this time. Check out other games nearby!

match_cancelled.title: Game Cancelled
match_cancelled.body: The {sportName} game on {matchDate} at {locationName} has been cancelled. We hope to see you on the court soon!

match_updated.title: Game Updated
match_updated.body: Your {sportName} game on {matchDate} has new details. Tap to review the changes.

match_starting_soon.title: Get Ready!
match_starting_soon.body: Your {sportName} game at {locationName} starts {timeUntil}. Time to warm up!

match_completed.title: Great Game!
match_completed.body: Your {sportName} game is complete. How did it go? Share your feedback!

player_kicked.title: Removed from Game
player_kicked.body: You've been removed from the {sportName} game on {matchDate}. Check out other games nearby!

player_left.title: Player Left
player_left.body: {playerName} left your {sportName} game. {spotsLeft} spot(s) now available.

chat.title: New Message
chat.body: You have a new message waiting for you

friend_request.title: New Connection Request
friend_request.body: {playerName} wants to add you to their network. Check out their profile!

rating_verified.title: Rating Verified!
rating_verified.body: Congrats! Your {ratingSystemName} rating of {ratingValue} for {sportName} is now verified.

reminder.title: Upcoming Game
reminder.body: Don't forget your {sportName} game on {matchDate} at {locationName}

payment.title: Payment Update
payment.body: Your payment status has been updated. Tap to view details.

support.title: Message from Rallia
support.body: Our support team has sent you a message. Tap to read.

system.title: Rallia Update
system.body: We have an update for you. Tap to learn more.

feedback_request.title: How Was Your Game?
feedback_request.body: Rate your {sportName} game with {opponentNames}. Your feedback helps the community!

feedback_reminder.title: Don't Forget to Rate Your Game
feedback_reminder.body: Your {sportName} game feedback closes in 24 hours. Rate your experience with {opponentNames}!

score_confirmation.title: Confirm Match Score
score_confirmation.body: Please confirm the final score for your {sportName} game on {matchDate}.

referenceRequest.noRequestsDescription: When other players ask you to verify their rating, their requests will appear here.
referenceRequest.headerInfo: Other players have asked you to verify their rating level. Tap on a request to review and respond.
referenceRequest.respondSubtitle: Help this player get their rating certified
referenceRequest.question: Based on your experience playing with {name}, is this rating accurate?
referenceRequest.messagePlaceholder: Add any feedback or context for the player...
referenceRequest.failedToSubmit: Failed to submit response. Please try again.
referenceRequest.privacyNote: Your response will be visible to the requesting player. Declined requests won't count towards their certification.

settings.notificationsDescription: Choose how you want to be notified about different events. Turn each option on or off.

notificationPreferences.title: Notification Preferences
notificationPreferences.description: Configure which notifications your organization receives and how they are delivered.
notificationPreferences.aboutDescription: These settings control which notifications are sent to organization admins and owners. Email notifications are sent to the primary email associated with each admin account. SMS notifications require a verified phone number.

bookings.label: Booking Notifications
bookings.description: Alerts when bookings are created, modified, or cancelled

members.label: Member Notifications
members.description: Updates about member activity and changes

payments.label: Payment Notifications
payments.description: Alerts for payment events and transactions

reports.label: Reports & Summaries
reports.description: Periodic summary emails about your organization

settings.languageDescription: Choose your preferred language for the app

general.title: General Settings
general.notAuthenticated: You must be signed in to access settings.
general.noOrganization: You must be a member of an organization to access settings.

booking.title: Booking Settings
booking.description: Configure how players can book courts.
booking.slotDurationHint: Default length of time for court bookings.
booking.minNoticeHint: How far in advance a booking must be made.
booking.maxAdvanceHint: How far ahead players can book.
booking.allowSameDayHint: Allow players to book courts on the same day.

orgPayments.title: Payment Settings
orgPayments.description: Connect and manage your Stripe account to receive payments for court bookings.
orgPayments.noOrganization: You need to be part of an organization to manage payment settings.

notConnected.title: Connect Your Stripe Account
notConnected.description: Connect a Stripe account to accept payments for court bookings. You'll be able to receive payments directly to your bank account.

onboardingIncomplete.title: Complete Your Stripe Setup
onboardingIncomplete.description: Your Stripe account setup is incomplete. Please continue the onboarding process to start accepting payments.

connected.title: Stripe Connected
connected.description: Your Stripe account is connected and ready to accept payments.

orgPayments.ownerOnly: Only organization owners can connect Stripe accounts.
orgPayments.helpText: Stripe is used to securely process payments. Funds will be deposited directly to your bank account.

errors.not_authorized: You are not authorized to manage this organization's payment settings.
errors.no_account: No Stripe account found. Please start the connection process again.
errors.callback_failed: An error occurred during the connection process. Please try again.

policies.title: Cancellation Policies
policies.description: Configure your cancellation and refund policies.
policies.notAuthenticated: You must be signed in to access policies.
policies.noOrganization: You must be a member of an organization to access policies.

cancellation.title: Refund Periods
cancellation.description: Define when players can cancel and receive refunds.
cancellation.freePeriodDescription: Cancellations made before this time receive a full refund.
cancellation.partialPeriodDescription: Cancellations made during this period receive a partial refund.
cancellation.noRefundPeriodDescription: Cancellations made after this point receive no refund.

preview.title: Policy Preview
preview.description: This is how your cancellation policy will appear to players.
preview.text: Cancellations made more than {freeHours} hours before your booking receive a full refund. Cancellations made between {partialHours} and {freeHours} hours before receive a {partialPercent}% refund. Cancellations made less than {noRefundHours} hours before receive no refund.

members.title: Members
members.description: Manage your organization members and their roles.
members.notAuthenticated: You must be signed in to manage members.
members.noOrganization: You must be a member of an organization to manage members.

remove.title: Remove Member
remove.description: Are you sure you want to remove {name} from your organization? They will lose access to all organization resources.

invite.title: Invite New Member
invite.description: Send an invitation email to add a new member to your organization.
invite.roleHint: The role determines what permissions the member will have.
invite.error: Failed to send invitation. Please try again.

pricing.title: Pricing Rules
pricing.description: Configure pricing for different times, days, and courts.
pricing.notAuthenticated: You must be signed in to manage pricing.
pricing.noOrganization: You must be a member of an organization to manage pricing.
pricing.noRules: No pricing rules configured. Add your first rule to customize pricing.
pricing.ruleFormDescription: Set custom pricing for specific times, days, or courts.

rules.title: Active Pricing Rules
rules.description: Higher priority rules take precedence when multiple rules apply.
rules.name: Name

form.name: Rule Name
form.priorityHint: Higher priority rules override lower ones.

delete.title: Delete Pricing Rule
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete the pricing rule "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.

permissions.description: Manage app permissions to enable features like notifications, finding games near you, and calendar sync.
permissions.settingsNote: If you denied a permission, you'll need to enable it in your device settings.

profile.title: Profile

status.noRatingSubtext: Set up your rating to start playing

profile.activateSportMessage: Activate {sport} to set up your rating and preferences

status.selfDeclaredDescription: This rating has not been verified yet
status.certifiedDescription: This rating has been verified by references or proofs
status.disputedDescription: Peer evaluations suggest a different skill level

referenceRequest.title: Request Reference

referenceRequest.description: Request references from certified players at your level or higher
referenceRequest.noEligiblePlayers: No eligible players found at your level or higher

evaluation.title: Peer Evaluation
evaluation.belowLevel: Evaluations suggest level may be lower

ratingProofs.title: Rating Proofs
ratingProofs.chooseProofType: Choose how you want to verify your rating
ratingProofs.noProofsDescription: Add proof of your rating to help others verify your skill level
ratingProofs.noProofsOtherUser: This user has not added any rating proofs yet

externalLink.title: External Link
externalLink.description: Link to your rating on an official platform (e.g., FFT, WTN, YouTube)
externalLink.urlHint: Enter the URL where your rating can be verified

video.title: Video Recording
video.description: Upload a video of you playing to verify your skill level

image.title: Screenshot / Image
image.description: Upload a screenshot of your official rating or ranking

document.title: Official Document
document.description: Upload an official rating certificate or license
document.supportedFormats: Supported formats: PDF, DOC, DOCX, TXT

form.title: Proof Title
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Add any additional details about this proof...

upload.fileTooLarge: File size exceeds the maximum allowed

delete.title: Delete Proof
delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this proof? This action cannot be undone.

info.title: About Rating Proofs
info.description: Rating proofs help verify your skill level to other players. Verified proofs increase trust and help you find better matches.

types.title: Types of Proof
types.externalLink: Link to an official rating website or video platform
types.video: Video recording of you playing (shows your actual skill)
types.image: Screenshot of your official rating or tournament results
types.document: Official certificate, license, or ranking document

info.verification: All proofs are reviewed before being marked as verified. This usually takes 1-2 business days.

errors.titleRequired: Please enter a title for your proof
errors.fileRequired: Please select a file to upload

gallery.title: Rating Proofs
gallery.noProofsDescription: This player hasn't added any proofs to verify their rating level.

onboarding.pageDescription: Set up your organization profile to get started
onboarding.title: Organization Information
onboarding.roleHint: Your role determines the permissions you'll have in this organization
onboarding.welcomeSubtitle: Find your perfect tennis and pickleball playing partners

onboarding.availabilitySubtitle: When are you usually available to play?

sportSelectionStep.title: Which sports would you like to play?

ntrpDescriptions.2_0: You have limited experience and are working primarily on getting the ball into play.
ntrpDescriptions.2_5: You are learning to judge where the ball is going and can sustain a short rally.
ntrpDescriptions.3_0: You can place shots with moderate success and can sustain a rally at a slow pace.
ntrpDescriptions.3_5: You have achieved improved stroke dependability with directional control.
ntrpDescriptions.4_0: You have dependable strokes and can handle pace and spin.
ntrpDescriptions.4_5: You have good shot anticipation and frequently have an outstanding shot.
ntrpDescriptions.5_0: You have good shot anticipation and frequently have an outstanding shot or attribute.
ntrpDescriptions.5_5: You can vary strategies and styles of play in competitive situations.
ntrpDescriptions.6_0: You have had intensive training for national tournament competition.
ntrpDescriptions.1_0: You are new to tennis and learning the basics.

duprDescriptions.2_0: You have limited experience and are working primarily on getting the ball into play.
duprDescriptions.2_5: You are learning to judge where the ball is going and can sustain a short rally.
duprDescriptions.3_0: You can place shots with moderate success and can sustain a rally at a slow pace.
duprDescriptions.3_5: You have achieved improved stroke dependability with directional control.
duprDescriptions.4_0: You have dependable strokes and can handle pace and spin.
duprDescriptions.4_5: You have good shot anticipation and frequently have an outstanding shot.
duprDescriptions.5_0: You have good shot anticipation and frequently have an outstanding shot or attribute.
duprDescriptions.5_5: You can vary strategies and styles of play in competitive situations.
duprDescriptions.6_0: You have had intensive training for national tournament competition.
duprDescriptions.1_5: You are new to pickleball and learning the basics.

hero.headline: Your next game is waiting.
hero.subheadline: Connect with players at your level, schedule games easily, and never play alone again.
hero.ctaSubtext: No credit card required â€¢ Exclusive early access

scheduling.title: The Scheduling Nightmare
scheduling.description: Hours spent coordinating through WhatsApp and Facebook. Last-minute cancellations. Games that never happen.

compatibility.title: The Compatibility Crisis
compatibility.description: Skill mismatches ruin the experience. Location conflicts. Different preferences. Finding the right game feels impossible.

reliability.title: The Reliability Problem
reliability.description: No-shows without warning. Players who cancel last minute. No way to know who's reliable.

growth.title: The Growth Barrier
growth.description: Can't find enough games to improve. Limited partner options. Skill progression stalls without regular play.

step1.title: Join the Waitlist
step1.description: Sign up with your email to secure your spot and get notified when we launch.

step2.title: Create Your Profile
step2.description: Share your skill level, location, and playing preferences.

step3.title: Get Matched
step3.description: We find playing partners that match your profile and availability.

step4.title: Play & Review
step4.description: Schedule games instantly and build your network of reliable players.

matchmaking.title: Smart Matchmaking
matchmaking.description: Smart skill assessment and reliability tracking. Get matched with players at your level who are just as committed.

scheduling.title: Instant Scheduling
scheduling.description: One-click game proposals with calendar sync. Auto-confirmations and live availability. No more endless back-and-forth.

marketplace.title: Game Marketplace
marketplace.description: Post or browse games by time, location, and skill level. Instant booking with ratings and reviews.

portfolio.title: Player Network
portfolio.description: Build your network of favorite players. Get suggestions based on your preferences and play history.

whyJoinEarly.description: Be part of the founding community and enjoy exclusive perks that won't be available after launch.

priority.title: Priority Access
priority.description: Skip the line and get immediate access when we launch.

pricing.title: Special Early Benefits
pricing.description: Enjoy special perks and benefits as an early supporter. Founding members get exclusive advantages.

influence.title: Shape the Product
influence.description: Your feedback directly influences features. Help us build what you need.

exclusive.title: Exclusive Features
exclusive.description: Get early access to beta features and new releases before anyone else.

community.title: Founding Community
community.description: Connect with other early adopters and build your network before the crowd arrives.

support.title: VIP Support
support.description: Direct line to our team. Get priority support and help shape our service standards.

cta.headline: Ready to Transform Your Tennis Experience?
cta.description: Be among the first to experience the future of tennis matchmaking. Join our waitlist and get exclusive early access when we launch.

first.name: Sarah M.
first.text: I tested the beta and the skill matching is incredible. Can't wait for the full launch - this will completely change how I find tennis partners!

second.name: Michael R.
second.text: Finally, someone is solving the real problem! The interface is clean and the matching algorithm actually understands what players need.

third.name: Jennifer L.
third.text: The scheduling feature alone is worth it. As a beta tester, I'm excited to see where this goes. Sign up for the waitlist!

waitlist.description: Be among the first to experience the future of tennis matchmaking. Get exclusive early access and special perks.

form.successMessage: Thanks! We'll be in touch soon.
form.noCard: No credit card required â€¢ Get exclusive perks as an early supporter

cost.question: Is Rallia free to use?
cost.answer: We're currently finalizing our pricing model. Early supporters will receive special benefits. Join the waitlist to stay updated on our plans.

sports.question: What sports are supported?
sports.answer: Currently, we support tennis and pickleball. We're planning to expand to other racquet sports like squash and badminton based on user demand.

matching.question: How does the skill matching work?
matching.answer: Our system analyzes your skill level, match history, and player feedback to assess your ability. You'll be matched with players at your level for competitive and enjoyable games.

privacy.question: Is my data private and secure?
privacy.answer: Absolutely. We use industry-standard encryption and never share your personal information with third parties. You control what information other players can see.

availability.question: When will Rallia be available?
availability.answer: We're currently in beta testing and plan to launch publicly in early 2026. Join our waitlist to get early access and be notified when we launch in your area.

platforms.question: What platforms is Rallia available on?
platforms.answer: Rallia will be available as a web app, iOS app, and Android app. You can access your account and schedule games from any device.

winter.title: Winter Indoor Court Crisis - Rallia
winter.subtitle: Solving the indoor court shortage for Canadian tennis and pickleball players

hero.headline: The outdoor season is over. Now what?
hero.subheadline: Over 5 million Canadian tennis players and 1.5 million pickleballers are about to be benched for weeks, sidelined by a severe lack of indoor courts.
hero.ctaSubtext: âœ“ Premium features FREE at launch  â€¢  âœ“ Help shape the app

problem.coreMessage: There simply aren't enough indoor courts for everyone who wants to play.

noCourtNoGame.title: No Court, No Game
noCourtNoGame.description: A shortage of indoor facilities is about to sideline 6 million Canadian tennis and pickleball players. While the demand for these sports is exploding, the number of indoor courts has stayed the same.

bookingCompetition.title: Booking is a Competition
bookingCompetition.description: It shouldn't be a competitive sport just to book a court. Prime time slots are gone in minutes. You're left refreshing pages at midnight, hoping for a cancellation.

temperatureDrop.title: Benched by the Cold
temperatureDrop.description: Your playing time shouldn't end just because the temperature drops. But without access to indoor facilities, thousands of players will go weeksâ€”or monthsâ€”without stepping on a court.

stats.courtDensityLabel: Indoor Court to Player Ratio in Canada
stats.demandGrowthLabel: Growth in Tennis & Pickleball Demand Since 2020

solution.sectionTitle: A Better Way to Share Court Time
solution.pitch: We're building a better way to connect and share court time.
solution.vision: We're building a community where players help each other get on the court, no matter the season.

findPartners.title: Find Booked Court Partners
findPartners.description: Connect with players who have already booked a court and need a partner. No court? No problem. They've done the hard partâ€”now you just need to show up and play.

shareCosts.title: Share the Cost
shareCosts.description: Indoor court time is expensive. Share the cost of that premium court with a great match, making winter play affordable for everyone.

fillCancellations.title: Fill Last-Minute Cancellations
fillCancellations.description: Get notified when court time opens up. Fill last-minute cancellations so no court time goes to waste. Turn someone's cancellation into your opportunity.

unlockPotential.title: Maximize Existing Facilities
unlockPotential.description: Unlock the full potential of existing facilities while championing future construction. Every court should be used to its maximum capacity.

foundingMember.offer: Sign up for the waitlist and get premium features FREE at launch.
foundingMember.survey: Help us build the perfect app for Canadian players. Join the waitlist and we'll send you a 3-question survey to tell us what you need most.
foundingMember.benefits: âœ“ Premium features FREE  â€¢  âœ“ Shape the product  â€¢  âœ“ Priority access

waitlist.description: Be part of the solution. Join our waitlist and help us build a community where every player gets on the court, no matter the season.

form.successMessage: Welcome to the founding community! Stay posted for future updates.
form.noCard: No credit card required â€¢ Premium features FREE at launch

whatIsThis.question: How does this solve the indoor court problem?
whatIsThis.answer: We're helping Canadian tennis and pickleball players deal with the indoor court shortage during winter months. We're building tools to help players find partners who have already booked courts, share costs, and fill last-minute cancellationsâ€”maximizing the use of existing facilities.

foundingMember.question: What do Founding Members get?
foundingMember.answer: Founding Members get premium features completely free when we launch. You'll also help shape the product through our survey, get priority access to the app, and be part of the community from day one.

whenLaunch.question: When will this be available?
whenLaunch.answer: We're launching in early 2026, just in time for the outdoor season. You'll have the full summer to build your network and master the app, so when winter 2026-2027 arrives, you'll be ready to dominate indoor court bookings. Join the waitlist to be notified when we launch.

bothSports.question: Does this work for both tennis and pickleball?
bothSports.answer: Yes! The indoor court shortage affects both tennis and pickleball players. Our platform is designed to help players of both sports find partners, share costs, and maximize court time.

howHelp.question: How will this help with the court shortage?
howHelp.answer: While we can't build new courts overnight, we can help maximize the use of existing facilities. By connecting players who need courts with those who have them booked, sharing costs, and filling cancellations, we ensure every minute of court time is used.

footer.title: Rallia
footer.description: The platform that will connect tennis and pickleball players for better games, every time.
